Text:
Comme d'hab, c'est super Shankly. Keep up the good work, we're all listening to U and you're helping us to discover GREAT music.
Cheers
Thanks again for another splendid mixtape. You are doing the music industry a great service: I wouldn't buy half the CDs I buy now without your compilations !!
Thanks so much! Still missing those dance compilations ;-)
Does anyone have any idea why I can't seem to download any of shankly's files any more? I haven't been able to download in a few months.
If your ISP is blocking bittorrent, that could be the problem. You could get a seedbox that allows public trackers...
Thanks but I can download other (inferior) mixtapes from the Pirate Bay, but not Shankly's. :(
Try his mixtapes that are listen on BTjunkie.

Awesome! It works!
Shanks - can you put all future torrents on BTJunkie too please?
